description: Curated list of worthy subjects for perpetual mining into AI training data

subjects.description: Complete coverage of cryptocurrency, blockchain, and digital asset technology including 220+ technical indicators, protocols, and ecosystem components
subjects.rationale: Democratize access to crypto expertise; currently 79% complete with high quality data
subjects.impact: Enable anyone to train AI agents with institutional-level crypto knowledge

subjects.description: Professional-grade knowledge on institutional crypto trading, custody, derivatives, compliance, and risk management
subjects.rationale: Bridge gap between retail and institutional crypto knowledge
subjects.impact: Train AI to provide institutional-quality financial advice

subjects.description: Complete smart contract development, dApp building, protocol design, and blockchain programming across all major platforms
subjects.rationale: Massive demand for blockchain developers, limited quality training resources

subjects.description: Deep coverage of DeFi protocols, mechanisms, risks, strategies, and best practices
subjects.rationale: DeFi is complex and evolving; need comprehensive, up-to-date knowledge base
subjects.impact: Safer DeFi participation through better education

subjects.description: Clinical examination, laboratory interpretation, imaging analysis, differential diagnosis, and diagnostic reasoning
subjects.rationale: Healthcare access is limited globally; AI can help bridge diagnostic gaps
subjects.impact: Improve healthcare access in underserved regions

subjects.description: Drug mechanisms, interactions, dosing, side effects, contraindications, and therapeutic applications
subjects.rationale: Drug knowledge is critical for safe prescribing and patient education
subjects.impact: Reduce medication errors and improve patient safety

subjects.description: Case law, statutes, legal reasoning, practice areas, procedures, and legal writing
subjects.rationale: Legal services are expensive; AI can democratize basic legal knowledge
subjects.impact: Increase access to justice through better legal education

subjects.description: Climate change mechanisms, impacts, mitigation strategies, renewable energy, and sustainability practices
subjects.rationale: Existential challenge requiring widespread understanding and action
subjects.impact: Enable informed climate action and policy decisions

subjects.description: Security principles, threat vectors, defensive techniques, privacy technologies, and best practices
subjects.rationale: Growing cyber threats require better security education
subjects.impact: Improve digital safety for individuals and organizations

subjects.description: ML algorithms, model training, deployment, optimization, and production ML systems
subjects.rationale: AI/ML skills are in massive demand with limited quality educational resources
subjects.impact: Democratize ML education and accelerate AI adoption

subjects.description: Macronutrients, micronutrients, dietary guidelines, nutritional therapy, and evidence-based nutrition
subjects.rationale: Nutrition misinformation is rampant; need evidence-based knowledge base
subjects.impact: Improve public health through better nutritional understanding

subjects.description: Psychological disorders, therapeutic approaches, mental wellness, crisis intervention, and evidence-based psychology
subjects.rationale: Mental health crisis worldwide; limited access to care
subjects.impact: Increase mental health literacy and support availability

subjects.description: Learning theories, teaching methods, assessment strategies, curriculum design, and educational psychology
subjects.rationale: Quality education is fundamental; AI can help scale effective teaching
subjects.impact: Improve educational outcomes through better pedagogy

subjects.description: Budgeting, investing, retirement planning, tax strategies, credit management, and financial decision-making
subjects.rationale: Financial illiteracy leads to poverty; need accessible financial education
subjects.impact: Improve financial outcomes for underserved populations

subjects.description: Statistical analysis, data visualization, predictive modeling, big data technologies, and analytical thinking
subjects.rationale: Data skills are essential in modern economy; high demand for training
subjects.impact: Democratize data literacy and analytical capabilities

selection_criteria.access: Is this knowledge currently limited or expensive?
selection_criteria.quality: Can we mine comprehensive, accurate training data?
selection_criteria.demand: Is there significant need for AI agents trained in this domain?
selection_criteria.feasibility: Can we break this into clear subtopics and generate quality Q&A?

metadata.community_input: Open to suggestions for worthy subjects
